text: The house La Boétie is in France in Sarlat-la-Canéda, in the Dordogne department in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region. Étienne de La Boétie, Michel de Montaigne's friend, was born there on November 1, 1530. The house was restored in 1910, after its classification in 1889. == References == Category:Dordogne
title: House of La Boétie
